RecipeDef.label: Create cybernetic bionic eye
RecipeDef.description: The advanced version of the bionic eye. The second generation of bionic upgrades, typically reserved for top brass military forces. Produces 1.

RecipeDef.label: Create cybernetic bionic arm
RecipeDef.description: The second generation of bionic upgrades, using nano fibres to produce artificial muscles. Gives the owner incredible strength. Not recomended for wardens that want to keep prisoners in one piece. Produces 1.

RecipeDef.label: Create cybernetic bionic hand
RecipeDef.description: The second generation of bionic upgrades that uses nano fibres to produce artificial muscles. The more limited version of arm upgrades, just replacing hands. Produces 1.

RecipeDef.label: Create cybernetic bionic foot
RecipeDef.description: The second generation of bionic upgrades, using nano fibres to produce artificial muscles. The more limited version of leg upgrades, just replacing feet. Produces 1.

RecipeDef.label: Create cybernetic bionic leg
RecipeDef.description: The second generation of bionic upgrades, using nano fibres to produce artificial muscles. Gives the owner incredible speed. Produces 1.

RecipeDef.label: Create cybernetic bionic jaw
RecipeDef.description: The second generation of bionic upgrades, using nano machinery to break down food instantly with minimal effort. Produces 1.

RecipeDef.label: Create cybernetic bionic ear
RecipeDef.description: The advanced version of the bionic ear. The second generation of bionic upgrades, typically reserved for top brass military forces. Produces 1.

RecipeDef.label: Create cybernetic bionic spine
RecipeDef.description: The advanced version of the bionic spine. The second generation of bionic upgrades, typically reserved for top brass military forces. Produces 1.

RecipeDef.label: Create cybernetic lung
RecipeDef.description: A powerful vascular augmentation that replaces a standard human lung. The perfect pairing with a cybernetic heart as this increases circulatory speed which increases overall efficiency. Produces 1.

RecipeDef.label: Create cybernetic stomach
RecipeDef.description: A powerful abdominal augmentation that replaces a standard human stomach. It increases digestion efficiency and metabolic efficiency. Produces 1.

RecipeDef.label: Create cybernetic liver
RecipeDef.description: A powerful abdominal augmentation that replaces the standard human liver. It increases blood filtration efficiency and metabolic efficiency. Produces 1.

RecipeDef.label: Create cybernetic kidney
RecipeDef.description: A powerful abdominal augmentation that replaces a standard human kidney. It increases blood filtration efficiency and metabolic efficiency. Produces 1.

RecipeDef.label: Create cybernetic heart
RecipeDef.description: A powerful cardiac augmentation that replaces a standard human heart. Safely manages very high blood flow without overwhelming standard body parts. Produces 1.
